1.title: Sophie/Claudia
1.plot: Most people know "Sophie" as an aspiring novelist, but she actually spends most of her time as a high-end escort. Keeping this secret has estranged her from her father who she rarely speaks to anymore. "Claudia" is a wife, a mother, and a medical assistant; but she's also $45K in debt. With nine credit cards, "Claudia", the persona she created, shops as a much wealthier woman. No one has any idea that she has driven her family into deep debt, not even her husband. Both women know they can no longer live with the guilt and the shame, but will either of these women have...

2.title: Niqui
2.plot: Niqui" is a loving wife and mother who has been lying to her husband since the beginning of their relationship. For countless nights over the past eight years, she has transformed into "Niqui", her ultra-confident alter ego, who regularly cheats on her husband. However it's not as simple as infidelity; she's been sleeping with women. The lies have created a distance between the couple and "Niqui" knows she can no longer live this lie, but if she chooses to tell the truth will it help mend their relationship or end it forever?

3.title: Ricky/Tiffany
3.plot: Most people know "Ricky" as a college student. But when "Ricky" leaves town, he leads a dark and dangerous life as a male escort. "Tiffany" is a hardworking and dedicated nurse. But after a 12 hour shift at the hospital, "Tiffany" takes off her scrubs and works as of an exotic dancer. Both "Ricky" and "Tiffany" feel immense shame about their secret lives but are fearful that coming clean to their loved ones will sever those relationships forever.

imdb.plot outline: Everyone lies occasionally. Where do you draw the line between little white lies and living a completely double life? This show follows people as they live through their lies, and the people they lie to along the way. Eventually they come clean and reveal the truth. The question then becomes-will the unsuspecting victims stay? Or make a run for the door.
imdb.title: Living in Secret
plot: Everyone lies occasionally. Where do you draw the line between little white lies and living a completely double life? This show follows people as they live through their lies, and the people they lie to along the way. Eventually they come clean and reveal the truth. The question then becomes-will the unsuspecting victims stay? Or make a run for the door.::Dyan Chaney
